title: Rachel Reeves, 45, Becomes First Woman UK Finance Minister
content: Britain's new Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Friday appointed Rachel Reeves as finance minister, the first woman to hold the position in the country's history, following Labour's landslide election victory.
summary: Britain's new Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Friday appointed Rachel Reeves as finance minister, the first woman to hold the position in the country's history, following Labour's landslide election victory.

title: New Dutch PM Under Fire Over Ministers' 'Racist' Remarks
content: Newly-minted Prime Minister Dick Schoof faced a baptism of fire at the opening of the Dutch parliament over remarks by two cabinet ministers about a conspiracy theory with neo-Nazi roots.
summary: Newly-minted Prime Minister Dick Schoof faced a baptism of fire at the opening of the Dutch parliament over remarks by two cabinet ministers about a conspiracy theory with neo-Nazi roots.

title: Rishi Sunak Lost Big. YouTuber Mocked Him With A Giant "L" Sign Behind Him
content: Rishi Sunak lost big at the UK polls. The message was further underlined by a YouTube star who stood behind him holding up a piece of paper with a giant letter "L" on it.
summary: Rishi Sunak lost big at the UK polls. The message was further underlined by a YouTube star who stood behind him holding up a piece of paper with a giant letter "L" on it.

title: Energy Hungry AI: What's The Hidden Cost of Your GenAI Search?
content: When you enter a prompt in an AI chatbot, it is consuming more resources than a traditional web search, driving higher carbon emissions. But can this uptick in resource consumption by the frontier technology of AI be quantified?
summary: When you enter a prompt in an AI chatbot, it is consuming more resources than a traditional web search, driving higher carbon emissions. But can this uptick in resource consumption by the frontier technology of AI be quantified?

title: Victoria Starmer: The Low-Profile Wife Of New UK Prime Minister
content: Victoria Starmer, whose husband Keir is the new UK prime minister, works in the public health service, is hardly photographed and has kept a low profile on the campaign trail.
summary: Victoria Starmer, whose husband Keir is the new UK prime minister, works in the public health service, is hardly photographed and has kept a low profile on the campaign trail.

title: Did A Robot Really Die By 'Suicide' In South Korea? Experts Probe
content: A robot employed by the Gumi City Council in South Korea went defunct after falling down a flight of stairs. While some have sensationalised the event as robot suicide', experts believe it is more likely a technical malfunction or glitch.
summary: A robot employed by the Gumi City Council in South Korea went defunct after falling down a flight of stairs. While some have sensationalised the event as robot suicide', experts believe it is more likely a technical malfunction or glitch.

title: Opinion: Rishi Sunak: For Whom Everything That Could Go Wrong, Went Wrong
content: Sunak has said he will remain an MP and he has denied suggestions that he's planning to move to California, where the family has a home. But his time at the highest echelons of British politics is almost over.
summary: Sunak has said he will remain an MP and he has denied suggestions that he's planning to move to California, where the family has a home. But his time at the highest echelons of British politics is almost over.

title: Putin To Host Private Dinner For PM Modi On July 8: Centre
content: Foreign Secretary Vinay Kwatra on Friday announced that Prime Minister Modi will arrive in Moscow on Monday (July 8) afternoon, he said, adding that the PM will then join a private dinner hosted by Russian President Vladimir Putin.
summary: Foreign Secretary Vinay Kwatra on Friday announced that Prime Minister Modi will arrive in Moscow on Monday (July 8) afternoon, he said, adding that the PM will then join a private dinner hosted by Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Biden Calls Himself "1st Black Woman" In White House In Latest Faux Pas
content: US President Joe Biden mistakenly referred to himself as "the first Black woman to serve with a Black president" in a recent interview.
summary: US President Joe Biden mistakenly referred to himself as "the first Black woman to serve with a Black president" in a recent interview.

title: "Country First, Party Second": Keir Starmer In First Speech As UK PM
content: Keir Starmer on Friday promised that his Labour government will work from day one on national renewal, in his first speech as UK prime minister from Downing Street.
summary: Keir Starmer on Friday promised that his Labour government will work from day one on national renewal, in his first speech as UK prime minister from Downing Street.

title: Labour Party's Keir Starmer Officially Appointed UK PM By King Charles
content: Britain's head of state King Charles III officially appointed Labour leader Keir Starmer as prime minister on Friday during an audience at Buckingham Palace.
summary: Britain's head of state King Charles III officially appointed Labour leader Keir Starmer as prime minister on Friday during an audience at Buckingham Palace.

title: Former Prime Minister Liz Truss Loses Her Seat By 630 Votes In UK Election
content: Liz Truss, Britain's shortest-serving prime minister, suffered further political ignominy Friday when she sensationally lost her seat in parliament at the British general election.
summary: Liz Truss, Britain's shortest-serving prime minister, suffered further political ignominy Friday when she sensationally lost her seat in parliament at the British general election.

title: 5 Key Takeaways From UK General Election
content: The UK general election marks a turning point for the country with Labour returning to power after 14 years of Conservatives in Downing Street.
summary: The UK general election marks a turning point for the country with Labour returning to power after 14 years of Conservatives in Downing Street.

title: UK Polls: Record Number Of Indian-Origin MPs Elected To British Parliament
content: A record number of around 26 Indian-origin members of Parliament have been elected to the House of Commons in the UK's general election as results were announced today.
summary: A record number of around 26 Indian-origin members of Parliament have been elected to the House of Commons in the UK's general election as results were announced today.

title: How India's UPI Is Marking Its Presence Ahead Of The Paris Olympics
content: After the successful implementation of the Unified Payments Interface or UPI for online ticket booking at Eiffel Tower, NPCI International Payments Limited (NIPL) today enabled the acceptance of UPI at Galeries Lafayette ahead of the Paris Olympics.
summary: After the successful implementation of the Unified Payments Interface or UPI for online ticket booking at Eiffel Tower, NPCI International Payments Limited (NIPL) today enabled the acceptance of UPI at Galeries Lafayette ahead of the Paris Olympics.

title: Alien Contact, War On Mars: Baba Vanga's Predictions For Coming Years
content: Her prophecies for the future include significant events such as a major conflict in Europe in 2025, contact with extraterrestrials in 2130, and a war on Mars in 3005.
summary: Her prophecies for the future include significant events such as a major conflict in Europe in 2025, contact with extraterrestrials in 2130, and a war on Mars in 3005.

title: From Crumbling Public Health Scheme To Economic Crisis, Why Rishi Sunak Lost
content: Why did Labour thump the Conservatives? The crumbling NHS, or National Health Service, state of the economy, and attendant concerns like price rise, were all high on the list of reasons for the defeat.
summary: Why did Labour thump the Conservatives? The crumbling NHS, or National Health Service, state of the economy, and attendant concerns like price rise, were all high on the list of reasons for the defeat.

title: "I Am Sorry...Have Heard Your Anger": Rishi Sunak As He Leaves Office
content: Rishi Sunak on Friday apologised to the public after his Conservatives were trounced by Labour in the UK general election, and said he would step down as party leader.
summary: Rishi Sunak on Friday apologised to the public after his Conservatives were trounced by Labour in the UK general election, and said he would step down as party leader.

title: "Swear Words Aimed At Tories": Larry The Cat Speaks Out On UK Poll Results
content: Larry the Cat, Chief Mouser of 10 Downing Street, has shared his thoughts on the recent UK election results.

title: WhatsApp Ventures Into Personalized AI Avatars With New Feature
content: According to The Verge, the feature discovered in the WhatsApp Beta for Android version 2.24.14.7 harnesses a combination of user-provided images, text prompts, and Meta's AI Llama model to generate these custom avatars.
summary: According to The Verge, the feature discovered in the WhatsApp Beta for Android version 2.24.14.7 harnesses a combination of user-provided images, text prompts, and Meta's AI Llama model to generate these custom avatars.
